origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_supply_chain_risk_data', 'description': 'Get the supply chain disruption risk data for a specific investment portfolio', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'portfolio_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the investment portfolio'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'risk_data', 'description': 'the supply chain disruption risk data for the portfolio'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要评估我的投资组合的供应链中断风险。首先，请获取我当前投资组合的供应链中断风险数据。然后，分析这些数据对不同资产类别的影响。接着，评估这些风险对我当前投资组合的潜在影响。最后，为我提供一个供应链中断风险分析报告。
获取我当前投资组合的供应链中断风险数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'portfolio_id'的值是什么?

{'risk_data': {'asset_class_1': {'risk_level': 'high', 'impact_details': 'High dependency on a single supplier in China'}, 'asset_class_2': {'risk_level': 'medium', 'impact_details': 'Moderate dependency on multiple suppliers in Southeast Asia'}, 'asset_class_3': {'risk_level': 'low', 'impact_details': 'Diversified supply chain with low dependency on any single region'}}}

prediction: 当前这一步的目标是评估投资组合的供应链中断风险，并获取供应链中断风险数据。
